sentence: Arrington described Mace as "the Liz Cheney of the South," invoking the Wyoming Republican who has become the most vocal critic of Trump in the party.
title: Trump is trying to oust one of South Carolina's rising GOP stars

sentence: Fox's Sean Hannity and Meadows had been texting since Election Day Earlier this year Rep. Liz Cheney read text messages between Meadows and several Fox News hosts during the Jan. 6 Capitol riot, including Sean Hannity.
author: Bart Jansen
title: Marjorie Taylor Greene said some lawmakers talked martial law after Jan. 6, according to texts released by CNN

sentence: Fourth, expect the remains of the establishment to divide over whether to rally around a candidate of anti-Trump principle from Liz Cheney to certain incarnations of Mike Pence or to make their peace with a harder-edged figure like DeSantis.
title: The Ohio Primary and the Return of the Republican Civil War
